data.name: CannotDrawNoEffect

data.name: CannotDrawNoShader
data.value: Both a valid vertex shader and pixel shader (or valid effect) must be set on the device before any draw operations may be performed.

data.name: CannotEndTwice
data.value: An "End" function can only be called once for each call to "Begin."

data.name: ValidIndex
data.value: This parameter must be a valid index within the array.

data.name: VertexElementIncorrectSize
data.value: The VertexElement array is either too large or too small.

data.name: VertexStrideTooBig
data.value: The vertex stride is larger than the vertex buffer. This is not allowed.

data.name: VertexStrideTooSmall
data.value: The vertex stride is too small for the type of data requested. This is not allowed.

data.name: VisualizationArrayTooSmall
data.value: Length of visualization data buffers must be at least {0}.

data.name: VoiceCreationFailed
data.value: Failed to create a low-level voice.

data.name: VoiceDestructionFailed
data.value: Failed to destroy the low-level voice.

data.name: WaveBankNotPrepared
data.value: The wave bank is not prepared.

data.name: WidthHeightTooLarge
data.value: Texture width or height is larger than the device supports.

data.name: WmpMediaSource
data.value: Local Windows Media Player library

data.name: WriteLeaderboardException
data.value: WriteLeaderboard event handler failed. See InnerException for details.

data.name: WriteOnlyGetNotSupported
data.value: Calling GetData on a resource that was created with BufferUsage.WriteOnly is not supported.

data.name: WrongNumberOfGamers
data.value: There are an invalid number of gamers listed in the {0} argument. This method supports between {1} and {2} gamers.

data.name: WrongResolveTargetSize
data.value: ResolveBackBuffer target texture is not the same size as the backbuffer.

data.name: WrongTextureFormat
data.value: The pixel format of the texture surface is not valid.

data.name: XactReadFile
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to read a file.

data.name: XlastAchievement
data.value: achievement

data.name: XlastContextValue
data.value: context value

data.name: XlastGameMode
data.value: game mode

data.name: XlastGamerPicture
data.value: gamer picture

data.name: XlastLeaderboard
data.value: leaderboard

data.name: XlastPresenceMode
data.value: presence mode

data.name: XlastProperty
data.value: property or context

data.name: XlastUnknown
data.value: Unknown {0} '{1}'. This was not defined in the XLAST configuration.
